name: The Trainer
description:
The Trainer is a turn-based adventure game that takes its art and mechanical inspiration from Pokemon and Dark Souls. The player can walk around in the overworld and fight against enemies after entering various biomes. The only one currently implemented is the grass biome.

HOW TO PLAY:

Press WASD to move around in the Overworld.

Wade through patches of grass to encounter enemies.

Use abilities when it's your turn!

CREDITS:

Base code for project taken from labs taught in our Game Engines III course by Joss Moo-Young.

Saving and Loading system implemented using the techniques taught in our Multiplayer Systems course by Fernando Restituto.
